item.title: Quartz
item.description: I’m using quartz as a repository for generating my [[KNOWLEDGES/Digital Garden]] on the web. The advantage of this approach is that it is totally free.

item.title: What mistakes I made on the crypto market in 2021-2022
item.description: What mistakes I made on the crypto market in 2021-2022 What mistakes I took Didn’t take profit Didn’t make own research Didn’t listen to Phil Konieczny - he said that we should get back to bitcoin, if I had done what he said I would save a lot from the losses I took Trusted in Luna Getting into Polkadot parachains - it was too late Getting into project I didn’t fully understand What worked Following influencers - getting into the projects, they talked about, early Diversification - it was good that I kept my assets in few places I moved some BTC to ledger

item.title: Habits
item.description: Habits Aktualnie Rano (6:20): Walking the dog (10 min) Wim Hoff’s WHM breathing exercises or Meditation - relaxation, counting breaths, mindfulness (15 min) Celery juice or water with lemon (10 min) Brushing teeth (left hand) (5 min) Tabata (5 min) Cold shower (5 min) Walking with autiobook/podcast (20 min) Breakfast (20 min) Rozpoczƒôcie pracy 8:00 Task planning (10 min) Journaling - [[KNOWLEDGES/5 minute journal]] (10 min) Own work

item.title: ShareFund
item.description: ShareFund Description A tool that helps in distributing shares in a cost-free startup. Aimed at startup founders and project creators. It responds to the needs of building projects together and instead of paying for adding value to the business each member receive a piece of a company.
